languages.text: "Дом Гапрак, которому вы поручили организацию торжеств, благодарит вас, что даже в эти темные дни вы не отвернулись от него и оказали честь представить вас подданным".

traits.locale_text: "Дом Гапрак, которому вы поручили организацию торжеств, благодарит вас, что даже в эти темные дни вы не отвернулись от него и оказали честь представить вас подданным".
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: "House Gaprak, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, thanks you for not turning your back on them even in these dark times and for allowing them the honour of introducing you to your subjects."
languages.original_text: "Дом Гапрак, которому вы поручили организацию торжеств, благодарит вас, что даже в эти темные дни вы не отвернулись от него и оказали честь представить вас подданным".

traits.locale_text: "House Gaprak, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, thanks you for not turning your back on them even in these dark times and for allowing them the honor of introducing you to your subjects."
traits.speaker: Steward

traits.locale_text: "House Gaprak, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, thanks you for not turning your back on them even in these dark times and for allowing them the honour of introducing you to your subjects."
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: 「ギャプラック家は陛下より祝祭の手配を承っております。この暗黒の時代にあってさえ奴らに背を向けることなく、栄誉ある臣下として受け入れるお姿に、心より感謝申し上げます。」
languages.original_text: "House Gaprak, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, thanks you for not turning your back on them even in these dark times and for allowing them the honour of introducing you to your subjects."

traits.locale_text: 「ギャプラック家は陛下より祝祭の手配を承っております。この暗黒の時代にあってさえ奴らに背を向けることなく、栄誉ある臣下として受け入れるお姿に、心より感謝申し上げます。」
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: “您已授权让贾帕克家族负责本次庆典。贾帕克家族感谢您在最黑暗的日子里也未曾背弃他们，赐予他们将您引见给臣民的至高殊荣。”
languages.original_text: "House Gaprak, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, thanks you for not turning your back on them even in these dark times and for allowing them the honour of introducing you to your subjects."

traits.locale_text: “您已授权让贾帕克家族负责本次庆典。贾帕克家族感谢您在最黑暗的日子里也未曾背弃他们，赐予他们将您引见给臣民的至高殊荣。”
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: «La casa Gaprak, a la que ha encargado los preparativos de los festejos, le agradece que no les haya dado la espalda, permitiéndoles presentarle ante sus súbditos, a pesar de los tiempos aciagos que corren».
languages.original_text: "House Gaprak, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, thanks you for not turning your back on them even in these dark times and for allowing them the honour of introducing you to your subjects."

traits.locale_text: «La casa Gaprak, a la que ha encargado los preparativos de los festejos, le agradece que no les haya dado la espalda, permitiéndoles presentarle ante sus súbditos, a pesar de los tiempos aciagos que corren».
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: « La maison Gaprak, que vous avez chargée d'organiser les festivités, vous remercie de ne pas lui avoir tourné le dos en ces temps difficiles et de lui avoir confié l'honneur de vous présenter à vos sujets. »
languages.original_text: "House Gaprak, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, thanks you for not turning your back on them even in these dark times and for allowing them the honour of introducing you to your subjects."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Gaprak, que vous avez chargée d'organiser les festivités, vous remercie de ne pas lui avoir tourné le dos en ces temps difficiles et de lui avoir confié l'honneur de vous présenter à vos sujets. »
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: "Das Haus Gaprak, dem Ihr das Arrangement der Festlichkeiten übertragen habt, dankt Euch dafür, dass Ihr ihm in diesen finsteren Zeiten nicht den Rücken gekehrt habt und ihm die Ehre gewährt, Euch Euren Untertanen vorzustellen."
languages.original_text: "House Gaprak, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, thanks you for not turning your back on them even in these dark times and for allowing them the honour of introducing you to your subjects."

traits.locale_text: "Das Haus Gaprak, dem Ihr das Arrangement der Festlichkeiten übertragen habt, dankt Euch dafür, dass Ihr ihm in diesen finsteren Zeiten nicht den Rücken gekehrt habt und ihm die Ehre gewährt, Euch Euren Untertanen vorzustellen."
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: "Şenlik tertibi ile tevdi ettiğiniz Gaprak Hanesi, bu kara günlerde bile onlara sırtınızı dönmediğiniz ve sizi tebaanızla tanıştırma şerefine nail olmalarına izin verdiğiniz için teşekkür ediyor."
languages.original_text: "House Gaprak, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, thanks you for not turning your back on them even in these dark times and for allowing them the honour of introducing you to your subjects."

traits.locale_text: "Şenlik tertibi ile tevdi ettiğiniz Gaprak Hanesi, bu kara günlerde bile onlara sırtınızı dönmediğiniz ve sizi tebaanızla tanıştırma şerefine nail olmalarına izin verdiğiniz için teşekkür ediyor."
traits.speaker: Steward
